subject: Collapse sample images instead of hiding, load 2 by default
body:
- Sample images now shown in collapsible section (expanded when library empty)
- Always accessible even after uploading images
- Load 2 random sample images by default on app start
- Sets up for future image library feature

https://claude.ai/code/session_01AQxUcta7zmziDFsrmzzuTm
title: Collapse sample images instead of hiding, load 2 by default
